T01D1160:211b-7: ba'i 'bras bu yang mngon par zhen cing lan la

T01D1160:211b-9: ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

T01D1160:211b-35: kye mgon po sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di dag
T01D1160:211b-36: 'du byed la sogs pa'am skye ba la sogs pa'i

T01D1160:212a-34: de ltar gyur pa des kyang nyes pa'i tshogs ci zhig bskyed ce na /

T01D1160:212a-37: der ni zhes bya ba nga'i zhes yongs su 'dzin

T01D1160:212a-39: la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ste /

T01D1160:212b-0: la sogs pa nyon mongs @212b pa gzhan rnams bsdus

T01D1160:212b-10: par byed do // bdag tu lta ba ni nyes pa thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //

T01D1160:212b-22: dus gang gi tshe na bdud kyi sde zhes bya
T01D1160:212b-23: ba bdud ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ste

T01D1160:212b-26: ba dang g-yul du 'jug pa'i tshul du ma ston
T01D1160:212b-27: pas shin tu 'jigs su rung ba yin no //

T01D1160:212b-30: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa yin la /

T01D1160:213a-15: phyogs kyi mun pas bsgribs shing dkar po'i chos kyi

T01D1160:213a-27: ma bgyis shing bsags pa'i sdig pa gang yin pa

T01D1160:213a-30: rjes 'gyod brnag dka' zhing zhes bya ba ste /

T01D1160:213a-32: rgyud sred par nus pa brnag dka' zhing bzod par

T01D1160:213a-35: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /

T01D1160:213a-43: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal bskyed cing nyams su myong bar
T01D1160:213a-44: byed pa de ni mi bzad pa yin te /
T01D1160:213a-45: shin tu brnag par dka' ba'i lus dang sems kyi
T01D1160:213b-0: @213b sdug bsngal du ma bskyod pa lags so zhes
T01D1160:213b-3: de las lhag pa'i rab gnod ci zhig mchis //
T01D1160:213b-4: zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i sdug
T01D1160:213b-5: bsngal de las lhag par ches rab tu gnod par
T01D1160:213b-6: byed pa'i dngos po ci zhig mchis zhes dri ba'i
T01D1160:213b-7: sgo nas / de las lhag pa'i rab tu gnod
T01D1160:213b-8: pa ni ci'ang ma mchis so zhes nges par gzung
T01D1160:213b-9: sgo nas / ba'o // de ltar sdug bsngal mi
T01D1160:213b-10: bzad pa'i rgyu yin par shes nas ni dor ba'i
T01D1160:213b-11: rigs pa las de ltar mi byed kyi /
T01D1160:213b-12: de ltar na yang de la rang nyid spyod //
T01D1160:213b-13: ces bya ba sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin du zin
T01D1160:213b-14: na yang de'i rgyur gyur pa'i sdig pa de la
T01D1160:213b-15: bdag rang nyid mngon sum du spyod par byed kyi
T01D1160:213b-16: de las ldog par mi bgyid pa de nyon mongs
T01D1160:213b-17: pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin no zhes rang gi
T01D1160:213b-18: nyes pa brjod pa'i sgo nas 'chags pa'o //
T01D1160:213b-19: gal te de ltar yin na de las /
T01D1160:213b-20: sems bzlog cing spang bar rigs pa yin pa las
T01D1160:213b-21: de ltar yang bzod par mi nus par bstan pa'i
T01D1160:213b-22: phyir ; gal te sna tshogs sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i //
T01D1160:213b-24: 'di ltar bzod pa ni bde ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin la /
T01D1160:213b-25: khro ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa yin pas /
T01D1160:213b-26: gal te sna tshogs sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i //
T01D1160:213b-27: zhes bya ba 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan gyi sdug
T01D1160:213b-28: bsngal lus dang sems kyi cha las byung ba rnam
T01D1160:213b-29: pa sna tshogs pa'i gzhi dang rgyur gyur pa ni
T01D1160:213b-31: de las ni sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
T01D1160:213b-32: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las bzlog na //
T01D1160:213b-33: zhes bya ba khong khro ba las byung ba'i rgyus
T01D1160:213b-34: gzhan la gnod cing sdug bsngal bar byed pa las
T01D1160:213b-35: / khro ba'i nyes pa rnams dran pa'i sgo nas
T01D1160:213b-36: de las sems rjes su bzlog cing gnyen po dran
T01D1160:213b-37: pas bzod pa sten par byed pa na'o //
T01D1160:213b-38: de ltar gnas pa'i tshe cing 'gyur zhe na /
T01D1160:213b-39: skye bo ngan pa nyes med dgrar gyur pa //
T01D1160:213b-40: ral gri'i so ltar gdug pas de 'khrug byed //
T01D1160:213b-42: bzod par mi nus kyi blo 'khrugs shing sems kyi rgyun rnyog pa can du byed do //
T01D1160:213b-44: skye bo ngan pa nyes med dgrar gyur pa //
T01D1160:213b-45: ral gri'i so ltar gdug pas de 'khrug byed //
T01D1160:214a-0: zhes bya ba skye bo'i tshogs tshul khrims dang bzod pa la sogs pa dam @214a * //
T01D1160:214a-1: pa'i spyod pa dang bral ba rang bzhin ngan par
T01D1160:214a-2: gyur pa rnams ni bdag gis gnod par byas pa'i
T01D1160:214a-3: nyes pa gzhi mod par yang rgyu med pa'i dgra
T01D1160:214a-4: bor gyur cing rjes su sdang bar gyur pa rnams
T01D1160:214a-5: kyi spyod pa ral gri'i so ltar gdug cing zhe
T01D1160:214a-6: gcod par byed pas bdag gi sems 'khrug par byed
T01D1160:214a-7: do // 'on te rang bzhin ngan pa de dag
T01D1160:214a-8: la yang bzod pa bsten cing de la brtse bar
T01D1160:214a-10: gang cho bdag yid bzod byed 'dod na yang //
T01D1160:214a-11: de tshe de yi nyes spyod 'ching bas bsdams //
T01D1160:214a-13: dus sam skad cig gang gi tshe bdag gi yid
T01D1160:214a-14: 'khrug par byed pa de las bzlog cing gnyen pos
T01D1160:214a-16: bzod pa'i tshul la gnas par byed 'dod na yang
T01D1160:214a-17: de'i tshe rang bzhin ngan pa'i dgra bo de'i rang
T01D1160:214a-18: bzhin ngan zhing gnod pa sna tshogs byed pa'i nye
T01D1160:214a-19: bar spyod pa sna tshogs pa sems kyi 'ching bar
T01D1160:214a-20: gyur pa rnams kyi sems slar yang bsdams shing dam
T01D1160:214a-21: du 'ching bar byed pas zhe sdang gi dbang du
T01D1160:214a-23: de ltar na yang de'i nyer spyod btang snyoms su gzhag cing sems glan mod ce na /
T01D1160:214a-24: de ni bkag cing yongs bsdams drag po yi //
T01D1160:214a-25: zhe sdang me yis yongs skems brtse dang bral //
T01D1160:214a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T01D1160:214a-27: de'i nye bar spyod pa ngan pa de las byung
T01D1160:214a-28: ba'i zhe sdang gi 'ching ba de nan gyis bkag
T01D1160:214a-29: cing yongs su bsdams pa na brnags drags pa nyid
T01D1160:214a-30: kyis sems kyi rgyun so na mi gnas shing khong
T01D1160:214a-31: khro ba'i dbang du gyur la /
T01D1160:214a-32: des na de las byung ba'i zhe sdang drag po
T01D1160:214a-33: de ni bdag dang gzhan gdung bar byed pas me
T01D1160:214a-35: me de yis 'phags pa chos kyi rlan dang sems
T01D1160:214a-36: bral bar byed pas sems kyi rgyud skems par byed
T01D1160:214a-37: pa yin la / de lta bu des na sems
T01D1160:214a-38: brtse ba dang bral zhing snying rje med de dam
T01D1160:214a-39: pa'i spyod pa bzod cing dang ba dang bral bar
T01D1160:214a-40: gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1160:214a-41: de ltar brtse ba dang bral ba'i sems ni ji ltar gnas she na /
T01D1160:214a-42: ji ltar mi bzad lta ba'i dug can dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T01D1160:214a-43: ji ltar zhes bya ba dper bya ba ni /
T01D1160:214a-44: mi bzad lta ba'i dug can dag / ces pa
T01D1160:214a-45: sbrul gang bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par mi nus
T01D1160:214b-0: @214b shing ; dug can gyi dbugs kyis brgyal bar byed nus pa'o //
T01D1160:214b-1: nang gnas shing ni mkhas rnams spong bar byed //
T01D1160:214b-2: ces bya ba ni shing gang gi khong stong gi
T01D1160:214b-3: cha na de lta bu'i sbrul gdug pas gnas bcas
T01D1160:214b-4: pa'i shing de ni mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa
T01D1160:214b-5: rnams rgyang ring por mod kho na la spong bar
T01D1160:214b-6: byed do ; / de bzhin khong khro'i spyod pa sbed pa yi //
T01D1160:214b-7: bdag gi bsam pa dge ba rnam spong byed //
T01D1160:214b-8: ces bya ba ni dpe bshad pa'i don bstan pa ste /
T01D1160:214b-9: tshul de bzhin du khong khro ba zhes bya ba
T01D1160:214b-10: sprul gdug pa lta bu'i zhe sdang gi cha las
T01D1160:214b-11: byung ba'i spyod pa gzhan la gnod par byed pa
T01D1160:214b-12: dug lta bu nang na gnas pa'i tshul sbed par
T01D1160:214b-13: byed cing 'chab par byed pa'i bdag gi bsam pa
T01D1160:214b-14: ste / sems kyi rnam pa shing lta bu ste /
T01D1160:214b-15: de dge ba rnams zhes bya ba bslab pa gsum
T01D1160:214b-16: la sogs pa mngon par mtho ba dang nges par
T01D1160:214b-17: legs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams kyis
T01D1160:214b-18: spong bar byed cing 'dor bar byed pa 'di skad
T01D1160:214b-19: ston te / gal te bdag gi sems la mnar
T01D1160:214b-20: sems dang ldan pa'i zhe sdang gi spyod pa sbrul
T01D1160:214b-21: lta bu gnas na de ni snod dug can lta
T01D1160:214b-22: bu yin pas dge ba'i chos rnams mi gnas shing
T01D1160:214b-23: spong bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1160:214b-24: sems la skyon chags pas chos kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T01D1160:214b-25: nyi ma'i zer gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T01D1160:214b-26: bdag gi bsam pa la dam pa'i chos kyi char
T01D1160:214b-27: 'bab pa don ma mchis so zhes bya bar sbyar
T01D1160:214b-28: ro // tshul ji ltar zhe na /
T01D1160:214b-29: nyi ma'i zer gyis bsregs pa'i rdo 'dra zhing //
T01D1160:214b-31: so ga'i nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha zhing
T01D1160:214b-32: rno bas bsregs shing gdungs pa'i rdo leb la char
T01D1160:214b-34: 'dra zhing zhes bya ba ni chos mthun pa ste /
T01D1160:214b-35: ji ltar rdo ba'i ngos la char gyi rgyun 'bab
T01D1160:214b-36: tu zin kyang 'phel ba'am myu gu skye ba la
T01D1160:214b-37: sogs pa mi snang zhing nang du yang ba ngas
T01D1160:214b-38: par mi 'gyur gyi phyi rol brlan pa tsam kho
T01D1160:214b-39: nar 'gyur la / de yang skad cig tsam na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T01D1160:214b-40: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i tshogs nyi ma'i zer
T01D1160:214b-41: ltar drag pa brgya phrag gis gdungs par gyur pa'i
T01D1160:214b-42: sems la ni chos kyi char ba'i don med do
T01D1160:214b-43: // gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T01D1160:215a-1: su bskams pas rdul gyur thal ba 'dra //
T01D1160:215a-3: ji ltar thal ba'i tshogs nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis
T01D1160:215a-4: yongs su gdungs shing kun nas bskams par byas pa
T01D1160:215a-5: ni rdul du gyur cing shin tu rtsub par gnas
T01D1160:215a-6: par thal ba dang 'dra ba ste /
T01D1160:215a-7: ji ltar thal ba'i phung po bskams shing rtsub par
T01D1160:215a-8: gyur pa la char 'bab tu zin kyang khyad par
T01D1160:215a-9: du gyur ba'i dngos po mi skye bas don med
T01D1160:215a-10: pa yin la / 'on te mang du 'bab pas
T01D1160:215a-11: brlan pa tsam du gyur pas dus gzhan na de
T01D1160:215a-13: tshul de 'dra bar bdag gi sems thog ma med
T01D1160:215a-14: pa'i dus can gyi rnam par rtog pa ngan pa'i
T01D1160:215a-15: tshogs kyis bsdams shing rdul can du gyur pa la
T01D1160:215a-16: chos kyi char 'bab pa don med do //
T01D1160:215a-17: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T01D1160:215a-18: bye ma'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i lam lta bu //
T01D1160:215a-20: bye ma'i tshogs ni bye ma'i phung po ste mang po zhes bya ba'i don la /
T01D1160:215a-21: des khyab pa ni kun nas g-yogs shing khebs pa ste /
T01D1160:215a-22: de lta bu'i phyogs kyi rgyun lam du ni char 'bab pa don med do //
T01D1160:215a-23: lta bur zhes bya ba ni dper bya ba ste
T01D1160:215a-24: ji ltar bye ma'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i lam du
T01D1160:215a-25: char gyi rgyun mang du bab kyang dgos pa byed
T01D1160:215a-26: par mi 'gyur gyi ring po mi thogs par snga
T01D1160:215a-29: bdag gi bsam par chos char don ma mchis //
T01D1160:215a-30: zhes bya ba bdag gi sems ma rig pa dang
T01D1160:215a-31: sred pa la sogs pa bye ma lta bus khyab
T01D1160:215a-32: pa'i gzhi la yang dag pa'i chos kyi char 'bab
T01D1160:215a-34: dpe 'di dag gis ni 'di skad du ston te /
T01D1160:215a-35: ji ltar zhing sa bzang po dag tu char 'bab
T01D1160:215a-36: pa ni 'bras bu la sems pa 'bru'i tshogs dang
T01D1160:215a-37: 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pas
T01D1160:215a-39: rdo ba'i rgyab dang thal ba'i tshogs dang bye ma'i
T01D1160:215a-40: lam du ni de lta ma yin no zhes chos
T01D1160:215a-41: mi mthun pa'i dpes bstan pa yin no //
T01D1160:215a-42: dpe gsum smos pa ni lung dang /
T01D1160:215a-44: don dam pa ste chos rnam pa gsum yod pas
T01D1160:215a-45: de dag brten pa don med pa dang go rims
T01D1160:215a-47: theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa'i snod du ma gyur pa dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
T01D1160:215b-0: 'di @215b slob dpon gyi dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T01D1160:215b-1: yon tan gyi tshogs mang pos brgyan cing dam pa'i
T01D1160:215b-2: spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis kyang re zhig
T01D1160:215b-3: bdag la smad pa ni bya ba'i cha yin te
T01D1160:215b-4: / gal te nye bar ma brtags pa'am /
T01D1160:215b-5: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis sdig pa
T01D1160:215b-6: mi dge ba byas pa na de sbyang ba'i thabs
T01D1160:215b-7: ni bdag la smod pa yin pa'am /
T01D1160:215b-8: gzhan dag tshul de ltar bstan pa'i sgo nas nyes
T01D1160:215b-9: pa 'tshams su 'jug pa ni rnam par sun 'byin
T01D1160:215b-10: pa'i stobs kyis sdig pa dang bral bar gyur te
T01D1160:215b-11: / sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas pa yang //
T01D1160:215b-12: bdag la rnam par smod pas bas par 'gyur //
T01D1160:215b-14: tshul 'di ni skabs 'di dang gzhan dag tu yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T01D1160:215b-15: bdag la smod pa'i tshul gzhan dag kyang bstan pa ni /
T01D1160:215b-16: rang gi sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T01D1160:215b-17: de'i don kyang kye 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bcom ldan 'das la bos te /
T01D1160:215b-18: de yang bdag gis bzod par mi nus te /
T01D1160:215b-19: khyed kyis bstan par mdzad pa'i lam la gus pa
T01D1160:215b-20: med cing don med par ma zad kyi khyed kyang
T01D1160:215b-21: bdag gis shes shing rten par ma nus so zhes
T01D1160:215b-22: bya ba ni'ang zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T01D1160:215b-24: rang gi sdug bsngal mi bzad ma dpyad pas //
T01D1160:215b-26: bdag rang nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i sdug bsngal
T01D1160:215b-27: gyi tshogs drag cing rtsub pa mi bzad cing brnag
T01D1160:215b-28: par dka' ba de sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa
T01D1160:215b-29: las byung ba yin pas blos ma dpyad cing rtog
T01D1160:215b-30: par ma gyur pas rgyu des na /
T01D1160:215b-31: gang zhig bdag la phan brtson lta bur ni //
T01D1160:215b-32: zhes pa khyed lta bu gang zhig bdag la phan
T01D1160:215b-33: par brtson zhing gnod pa las bzlog pa'i mdza' bshes
T01D1160:215b-35: lta bu zhes bya ba dper mi drang bar /
T01D1160:215b-36: gang zhig bdag la phan par brtson pa nyid //
T01D1160:215b-37: ces nges par gzung bar drang du yang rung ste
T01D1160:215b-38: bdag la phan par brtson pa nyid du gyur pa'o
T01D1160:215b-40: bzod dang sbyin pas bdag la phan 'dogs pa //
T01D1160:215b-41: 'jig rten mgon de'ang bdag gis bzod mi nus //
T01D1160:215b-43: bzod pa dang ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T01D1160:215b-44: sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T01D1160:216a-1: la phan gdags pa'i thabs kyi dam pa yin pas gtsor smos pa yin te /
T01D1160:216a-2: de dag gis mchog tu phan 'dogs shing dgos pa
T01D1160:216a-3: sgrub par byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pa las
T01D1160:216a-4: de dag rjes su ston par mdzad pa na /
T01D1160:216a-5: bdag gis bzod cing bsten par mi nus so //
T01D1160:216a-7: bdag ci zhig byed cing bzod mi nus she na /
T01D1160:216a-8: sdang bar byed dam 'bros shing 'byol ba'am //
T01D1160:216a-10: sdang bar byed pa ni dgra bor 'du shes pa'o //
T01D1160:216a-11: gzhan yang ci zhig byed ce na /
T01D1160:216a-13: phan pa'i gdams ngag bstan pa na de mi bzod par gzhan du 'gro ba'o //
T01D1160:216a-14: rab tu g-yeng ngam zlog par byed na yang //
T01D1160:216a-15: zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag mi len par phan
T01D1160:216a-16: tshun rgyu zhing gnas su sems phyogs par byed pa'am
T01D1160:216a-17: / zlog par byed dam zhes bya ba ni gnas
T01D1160:216a-18: na gnas pa nyid na yang slar tshig gis bzlog
T01D1160:216a-20: yang zhes bya ba ni shin tu dka' ba'i tshul te /
T01D1160:216a-21: 'di ltar gdul dka' ba mi srun pa sems kyi
T01D1160:216a-22: rgyun log par mos pas skal pa med par gyur
T01D1160:216a-23: pa de lta bu la yang ston par mdzad cing
T01D1160:216a-24: / dam pa'i chos kyi char gyis sbyin par mdzad
T01D1160:216a-25: pas bdag 'dra ba skal ba med cing rang bzhin
T01D1160:216a-27: rgyun mi 'chad par bdag 'dra la slob byed //
T01D1160:216a-28: de 'dra'ang bla ma yin snyam bdag mi sems //
T01D1160:216a-29: zhes bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par slob par mdzad
T01D1160:216a-30: cing rig pa la 'dzud par mdzad cing skal ba
T01D1160:216a-32: de 'dra zhes bya ba de lta bu la yang
T01D1160:216a-33: phan pa'i gdams ngag bstan pa'i bla ma yin pa
T01D1160:216a-34: snyam du bdag mi sems te /
T01D1160:216a-35: ma rig pas blo'i mig ldongs pa'i phyir log par 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1160:216a-37: ji ltar dmus long dag gis nyi ma dang zla
T01D1160:216a-38: ba'i rnam pa mi shes pa bzhin du lus dang
T01D1160:216a-39: sems kyi rgyud ma bsgom pa'i sems can dag gis
T01D1160:216a-40: kyang chos zab mo'i don rtogs shing phan pa'i gdams
T01D1160:216a-41: ngag len par mi nus so //
T01D1160:216a-42: de ltar sems kyi skyon gyi 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs smras nas /
T01D1160:216a-43: da ni rnal ma'i sems kyis yang bcom ldan 'das
T01D1160:216b-0: la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul bstan pa'i @216b phyir
T01D1160:216b-1: ; song ste gsol ba btab kyang rnyed dka' zhing //
T01D1160:216b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T01D1160:216b-3: song ste zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu
T01D1160:216b-4: 'ga' zhig yod na don du gnyer ba de de'i
T01D1160:216b-5: thad du song nas bsnyen bkur la sogs pas mnyes
T01D1160:216b-6: par byas te / gsol ba btab par gyur kyang
T01D1160:216b-7: rnyed par dka' zhing thob par dka' ba lta bu
T01D1160:216b-8: par byas te / yin pa dang / bzod pa'i dus su sman chen mchog gyur pa //
T01D1160:216b-9: bzod pa'i ngang tshul gal te mi bzod na //
T01D1160:216b-10: zhes bya ba gang gi tshe khro ba'i dgra bos gtses pa'i sems rme byung ba na /
T01D1160:216b-11: sdug bsngal dang du len pa la sogs pa'i thabs kyis gso dgos pa yin la /
T01D1160:216b-12: des na de'i tshe bsten pa'i sman sems kyi nad
T01D1160:216b-13: gso bas chen por gyur pa thabs gzhan las khyad
T01D1160:216b-14: par 'phags pa mchog tu gyur pa ni bzod pa
T01D1160:216b-15: yin pas bzod pa bsten dgos na bzod pa'i ngang
T01D1160:216b-17: gal te ma bzod cing bsten par ma byas na zhe sdang gi nad gso ba'i /
T01D1160:216b-18: bzod pa'i rgyu gzhan bdag la ci zhig mchis //
T01D1160:216b-19: zhes pa bzod pa'i rgyu'i thabs gzhan bdag la ci
T01D1160:216b-20: zhig mchis te ma mchis so zhes bya ba'i don

T01D1160:224b-0: der yang rgyun du @224b sems ni rnam rmongs pa'i //
T01D1160:224b-1: mdze can rkang pa lag pa chad pa la //

T01D1160:229b-32: brten brtsams srid pa sbyang phyir yin //
T01D1160:229b-33: de yi 'grel pa zla zer ltar //
T01D1160:229b-35: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnam sbyangs nas //
T01D1160:229b-36: skyon bral sangs rgyas nyid thob shog /
T01D1160:229b-37: bshags bstod kyi 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01D1160:229b-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po buddha shr'i sh'anti dang /
T01D1160:229b-40: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
